title: 求大佬看看服务器启动时有有这个警告   有没有办法屏蔽或者修改文件使其消失
author: qwe2415467313
txt_content:
[11:52:48 警告] =============================================================
[11:52:48 警告] MOD HAS DIRECT REFERENCE System.exit() THIS IS NOT ALLOWED REROUTING TO FML!
[11:52:48 警告] Offendor: net/md_5/specialsource/SpecialSource.main([Ljava/lang/String;)V
[11:52:48 警告] Use FMLCommonHandler.exitJava instead
